GSD.description:
drm/virtio: Check whether transferred 2D BO is shmem

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.150 by commit f134f261d76ae3d5ecf68db642eaa746ceb84cfb. For more details please see the references link.
